```{r}
#| label: load-packages
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(tidyverse)
library(caret)
```

```{r}
#| label: load-data
#| message: false

# Load training data
train_data <- read_csv("imaging-subgroup/data/processed/trainData.csv")
# Load variable selection data
var_data <- read_csv("imaging-subgroup/results/reports/top_loading_factor_by_subgroup.csv")
```


```{r}
#| label: data-prep

# Extract variable names from the factor loadings
variable_list <- as.character(var_data$variable)

# Filter the training data to include only the selected variables
model_data <- train_data %>%
  select(all_of(variable_list), `Mol Subtype`) %>%
  mutate(`Mol Subtype` = as.factor(`Mol Subtype`))

view(model_data)
```
